app_description.message: Verify and analyze the Ads.txt and the corresponding Sellers.json entry.

analyse_button_description.message: Press the Analyze button to analyze the $1 file for this domain.

contact.message: Provides contact information for the owner of the ads.txt/App-ads.txt file.

direct.message: The publisher directly controls the account for selling ads.

inventorypartnerdomain.message: Domain of a partner authorized to monetize ads within the content.

managerdomain.message: Domain of the entity managing ad monetization for the publisher.

ownerdomain.message: The business domain that owns the site or app.

reseller.message: An authorized third party resells ad inventory on behalf of the publisher.

subdomain.message: Refers to a subdomain with its own Ads.txt/App-ads.txt file for ad authorization.

owner_domain_not_listed_as_publisher_in_.message: Owner domain not listed as publisher in Sellers.json

managerdomain_is_registered_as_a_seller.message: MANAGERDOMAIN is registered as a seller

some_sellers_does_not_disclose_informati.message: Some sellers do not disclose information

both.message: Both a PUBLISHER and an INTERMEDIARY, selling their own ad inventory and reselling ad inventory.

confidential.message: An entity that keeps its information confidential.

intermediary.message: An entity that does not own ad inventory, but acts as a reseller or ad exchange intermediary.

publisher.message: An entity that own inventory and is directly paid by the advertising system.

passthrough.message: Intermediaries connecting sellers and buyers of advertising space.

inventory_from_both_domains.message: Inventory available from both OWNERDOMAIN and MANAGERDOMAIN sellers

error_10010_file_not_found.message: Error (10010): ads.txt or app-ads.txt is missing.

error_10030_connection_timeout.message: Error (10030): Unable to access ads.txt within time limit.

error_10040_too_many_redirects.message: Error (10040): Exceeds 5 redirects within root domain.

error_10050_external_redirect_limit.message: Error (10050): Exceeds 1 redirect outside root domain.

error_11010_missing_required_fields.message: Error (11010): Each line must contain 3 fields.

error_11020_invalid_relationship.message: Error (11020): Third field must be DIRECT or RESELLER.

error_11030_invalid_domain.message: Error (11030): Advertising system domain is not valid.

error_11040_empty_file.message: Error (11040): At least one valid entry is required.

error_11050_invalid_characters.message: Error (11050): Fields contain unescaped tabs, commas or spaces.

alert_12010_missing_sellers_json.message: Alert (12010): Advertising system lacks sellers.json file.

error_12020_publisher_id_not_listed.message: Error (12020): Publisher ID not listed in sellers.json. Request registration of ID or remove ID from Ads.txt.

alert_12030_domain_mismatch.message: Alert (12030): Seller domain $1 does not match OWNERDOMAIN.

alert_12040_relationship_type_both.message: Alert (12040): Publisher ID is registered as BOTH.

alert_12050_relationship_mismatch.message: Alert (12050): Publisher ID listed as INTERMEDIARY instead of PUBLISHER.

error_12060_duplicate_seller_id.message: Error (12060): Publisher ID appears multiple times in sellers.json.

alert_13010_missing_sellers_json.message: Alert (13010): The sellers.json file is missing for this advertising system. Request the administrator of the advertising system to install sellers.json.

error_13020_publisher_id_not_listed.message: Error (13020): Publisher ID not listed in sellers.json. Request registration of ID or remove ID from Ads.txt.

alert_13030_domain_mismatch.message: Alert (13030): Check the reseller domain $1 is correct.

alert_13040_relationship_type_both.message: Alert (13040): Publisher ID is registered as BOTH.

error_13050_relationship_mismatch.message: Error (13050): Publisher ID registered as INTERMEDIARY instead of PUBLISHER.

alert_13060_duplicate_seller_id.message: Publisher ID appears multiple times in sellers.json.

error_14020_invalid_subdomain.message: Error (14020): The subdomain is not a valid domain.

error_14030_invalid_subdomain.message: Error (14030): Not a subdomain of the root domain.
